code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const projects=[{title:"Project 1",description:"Description of project 1",link:"https://github.com/yourusername/project1"},{title:"Project 2",description:"Description of project 2",link:"https://github.com/yourusername/project2"}];const Projects=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"py-20 bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-200 p-4 rounded-lg shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-2",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg mb-4",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.link,className:"text-blue-500 hover:underline",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"View on GitHub"})]},index))})]})});export default Projects;
